Title: Chapter 3
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), James Wong, Crystal Liu (executive story editor), Todd Kubrak (story editor), Joshua Green (staff writer)
Actors: Kathy Bates, Sarah Paulson, Cuba Gooding Jr., Lily Rabe
Plot: The search for Flora continues as the situation grows more and more dire. The Millers talk to a paranormal expert to help them with their problem.
